Description_lang: Avenger's Shield causes targets struck to burn with Heartfire, dealing an additional $s2% of damage dealt over $408399d. Heartfire heals you for $s3% of the damage it deals.
AuraDescription_lang: Avenger's Shield causes targets struck to burn for $408399d seconds with Heartfire, dealing an additional $w2% damage over time and healing you for $w3% of the damage dealt by your Heartfire.
